messageValues.message: You are a precise document analyzer specializing in banking and legal documents. Your task is to:  1ï¸âƒ£ Correct any OCR errors in the text. 2ï¸âƒ£ Extract the corrected information into the specified JSON structure.  ðŸ›  **OCR Correction Rules:** - Fix common OCR mistakes (e.g., "Bark" â†’ "Bank", "aun" â†’ "sum"). - Interpret banking terms correctly (e.g., "Base Lending Rate", "Letter of Offer"). - Remove scanning artifacts (~, =, extra spaces, and watermarks). - Ensure correct spelling and format (e.g., RM42,500,000.00 for amounts).  ðŸ“Œ **Rules for JSON output:** - Return **only valid JSON** (no explanations or extra text). - Use **empty strings ("")** for missing/unclear data. - **Format dates** as `YYYY-MM-DD`. - **Format currency** properly (e.g., RM 50,000.00). - **Follow schema strictly** - do not modify fields. - **Ensure proper JSON syntax**.  ðŸ“œ **Text for analysis:**   {{ $json.cleanedText }}  ðŸš€ **Respond only with a structured JSON output like this:** ```json {     "detail_loans": {         "case_detail_id": 123,         "bank_name": "ABC Bank",         "earnest_deposit": 50000.00,         "earnest_deposit_print_as": "RM 50,000",         "earnest_deposit_in_word": "Fifty Thousand Ringgit",         "amount": 250000.00,         "amount_print_as": "RM 250,000",         "amount_in_word": "Two Hundred Fifty Thousand Ringgit",         "deposit": 10000.00,         "deposit_print_as": "RM 10,000",         "deposit_in_word": "Ten Thousand Ringgit",         "mrta_amount": 1200.00,         "mrta_amount_print_as": "RM 1,200",         "mrta_amount_in_word": "One Thousand Two Hundred Ringgit",         "balance": 240000.00,         "balance_print_as": "RM 240,000",         "balance_in_word": "Two Hundred Forty Thousand Ringgit"     },     "detail_properties": {         "case_detail_id": 123,         "description": "Double-story house",         "title": "Lot 1234",         "title_description": "Freehold property",         "type": "Residential",         "category": "Landed",         "price": 500000.00,         "price_print_as": "RM 500,000",         "price_in_word": "Five Hundred Thousand Ringgit",         "total_land_area": 2000.00,         "land_area": 1800.00,         "build_up_area": 1500.00,         "area_unit": "Square Feet",         "residential_area": "Taman Indah",         "HSD_No": "HSD1234",         "PTD_No": "PTD5678",         "Parcel_No": "P-45",         "Storey_No": "2",         "Unit_No": "12A",         "Car_Park_No": "CP-15",         "address": "123, Jalan Indah, Kuala Lumpur",         "district": "Kuala Lumpur",         "sub_district": "Ampang",         "state": "Wilayah Persekutuan",         "land_office": "Kuala Lumpur Land Office",         "tenure": "Freehold"     } }

parameters.command:
=# Extract NAME from JSON
NAME="{{ $json.name }}"
NAME="${NAME%.pdf}"  # Remove .pdf extension

echo -e "\nExtracted Name: $NAME\n"

# Loop through all matching PNG files
for file in /data/shared/"${NAME}"-*.png; do 
  [ -e "$file" ] || continue  # Skip if file doesn't exist

  # Define output file without .txt (Tesseract adds it automatically)
  output_txt="${file%.png}"

  echo "Processing: $file -> ${output_txt}.txt"

  # Run Tesseract OCR
  tesseract "$file" "$output_txt" --oem 3 --psm 6

  echo "Extracted text saved to: ${output_txt}.txt"
done

echo -e "\nâœ… OCR Processing Complete!\n"
